price: Mu by’ukuri ba bandi babayeho mbere yabo bacuriye imigambi mibisha (Intumwa zabo), ariko Allah ni We uburizamo imigambi mibisha yose. Azi neza ibyo buri muntu akora, kandi abahakanyi bazamenya uzagira iherezo ryiza.
arabic: وَقَدۡ مَكَرَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ فَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡمَكۡرُ جَمِيعٗاۖ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تَكۡسِبُ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖۗ وَسَيَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡكُفَّٰرُ لِمَنۡ عُقۡبَى ٱلدَّارِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: waqad makara alladhīna min qablihim falillahi al-makru jamīʿan yaʿlamu mā taksibu kullu nafsin wasayaʿlamu al-kufāru liman ʿuq'bā al-dāri
